title: Demonic Possession and Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/23/18

description:
George Noory and spiritual warfare expert Bill Bean discuss his work fighting evil spirits and performing exorcisms, and whether the number of demonic possession cases are increasing worldwide.
